tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Laparoscopy Hysterectomy,Uterus Removal Surgery,Uterine Bleeding,Endometrial Biopsy,Cervical Polypectomy,
review:
Our experience with Dr. Aruna Kumari at Kshema Hospitals, Sarjapur Road, was really amazing. When my mom needed help with her health, Dr. Aruna Kumari's kindness and good treatment quickly made us trust her. She always listened carefully and talked to us in a way that made us feel better.

When my mom needed a D&C test and biopsy, Dr. Aruna Kumari did it very well, and my mom recovered well. Even though she moved to Cloudnine Hospitals, which was far away, we still trusted her enough to go back to her when my mom had another health problem two years later.

Even though we saw a local doctor and had some tests done, we always believed Dr. Aruna Kumari was the best choice. She planned for the surgery in Manipal Hospital, Sarjapur Road as there is frozen section available. She guided us through everything, getting us ready for a big surgery. Before the surgery, she talked with us to make sure we understood what was happening, and she was always available when we called or messaged her.

During the surgery, Dr. Aruna Kumari always told us what was happening, and even though it took longer than expected, everything went well because of her expertise. When my mom was in the hospital, Dr. Aruna Kumari's visits made her feel happier and helped her get better.

We've become really close to Dr. Aruna Kumari, more than just as doctor and patient. She showed us what great care looks like, and we're really grateful to her for everything she did for us. She's the kind of doctor we hope everyone could have. We want to say a big thank you to Dr. Aruna Kumari for being there for us every step of the way.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I have consulted Dr.Aruna in my 3rd month of pregnancy and decided to continue my pregnancy consultation and checkup with her after first meet .
She is very friendly and explains everything clearly.
She is available over phone any time and responds to messages all the time.
We wanted to go for normal delivery and Dr.Aruna guided by all means and encouraged us to go for normal delivery.
But due to baby head position had to go for emergency c-section in last minute after trying for normal delivery for few hours .
Doctor was available throughout my labour and I delivered a healthy baby girl .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ** ***** ** *** ** *** **** ******* ** **********. She was very patient with us answering all questions as it was our first.  She was always diligent with all our tests and scans and provided effective advise throughout my journey so I could avoid gestational diabetes and high blood pressure during my pregnancy as I was prone to the issues. But her appropiate guidance when needed was very helpful throughout my journey. I delivered my baby boy through c section and am highly satisfied and recommend every pregnant lady to give her a visit.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
The clinic is very disappointing. I have still not got my test results. They made us pay and asked us to come the next day to get the tests and the results haven‚Äôt been shared yet. We kept calling and the staff kept reassuring that within next one hour they will
Share results and finally after the fifth call at the end of the day we were told
We would only get the results after 24hours. There was no proper communication. The person who took my blood sample pushed some blood back which has resulted in a huge blood clot on my arm. 

The doctor seemed like she was in a hurry. This is our first pregnancy and she is the first doctor/ medical professional we visited and the meeting was over in 3mins after waiting for 30mins..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy Tests,Pregnant Women Counseling,Pregnancy Scan,
review:
We initially opted for a gynaecologist, which is near to our place and for an initial 1 month and few weeks we consulted her but never had 100% satisfaction. Later, from our family friends, we heard about Dr Aruna Kumari and consulted her after 6-7 weeks of pregnancy. The very first visit was extremely satisfactory and Dr Aruna made us feel like she is part of our family and shared her number as well to approach her, whenever the need arises. She off-loaded all our stress from our minds and time passed so quickly that we did not realize.

Also, my wife was in favour of normal delivery, Dr Aruna‚Äôs suggestion has always been like it depends in circumstances, which is very true, she was used to explaining each and everything in detail and was used to please us. At last, my wife underwent normal delivery, which was an awesome feeling for both of us.

Really, we are very lucky to have Dr Aruna Kumari V !! We are thankful from the bottom of our heart for you doing so much for us and making us feel great ÔÅä ÔÅä, it‚Äôs really a feeling that cannot be described in words ‚Ä¶..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had been consulting Dr Aruna throughout the pregnancy.she was really helpful and guided us throughout the journey.  From the time the pregnancy was confirmed till our little one was delivered, She's been always there for us.She was kind enough to be available over phone or messages whenever we had any urgent queries.She would paitently address all our concerns with detailed explanation and let us know the right course of action.I have a very positive feedback with the overall experience and I would highly recommend Dr Aruna to anyone looking for a gynaecology consultation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Having consulted Dr. Aruna in the past, we were sure we wanted to be under her guidance during our first pregnancy journey. She has always been available over phone and messages for big or small queries and responds to them patiently with all details. My labour was induced late at night and she constantly monitored the progress throughout. Eventually due to complication she promptly took decision of emergency c section and we were blessed with an angel.
She clearly explains the course of treatment and advises medication only if absolutely necessary (focuses on lifestyle change and natural treatment). Her consultation sessions have always been assuring that everything is going to be alright despite all complications. We are extremely grateful for her support and for sure made the right decision to select Dr. Aruna for our pregnancy journey.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: First of all this was my first pregnancy.......I was very much afraid....At my initial stage I was consulting some other doctor and I was not satisfied with her treatment....After meeting Aruna mam i felt very comfortable and relaxed....she used to check properly and tells me what's happening..... whenever I call or text her she used to reply immediately without any hesitation that was the best thing about her......I had my delivery symptoms on a festive day....she was having her vacation....still she came to hospital.....I was blessed with a baby boy through normal delivery after having 6hrs of labour pain....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy care and management,Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,High-Risk Pregnancy Care,Cesarean Delivery,
review:
We have been blessed with Baby boy last week, and would like to share our experience at cloudnine Bellandur.

First of all, Many thanks to Dr. Aruna Kumari V. She help us through out the pregnancy. She explained every thing very well and make us comfortable, even though we are so much  worried about. She handle all the things very calmy and always reachable to us on mobile through out pregnancy.  Also during delivery she was very calm and did her best to overcome all the risk of cesarean delivery. She always explained us all the things and help us. After meeting her,  we feel more comfortable and confident about whatever worry we have.  
We are grateful to Dr. Aruna for giving us THE gift of our life.

Thank you mam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We consulted Dr.Aruna Kumari for my second pregnancy in cloud nine Bellandur. Under her guidance we delivered a baby boy as normal. She is one of the best doctor and humble human being we have ever met. She     was always reachable for our queries and concerns. She also make sure to explain each and every point during the consultation especially on the need of each medicine that is prescribed. My labour pain started at odd hours in the morning but she made sure that she show up during the delivery. She also made sure my husband is near me during delivery. We highly recommend her  for all gyno related consultations.  THANK YOU DOCTOR FOR EVERYTHING!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My experience with the doctor has been truly satisfying and would gladly recommend her. During my pregnancy, once I fell ill due to some food infection and that was the first time I have have visited her. On my first visit, she has shared her number for any emergency and also has always been available over phone. We were looking for a doctor for delivery who can be trusted blindly and she is one such doctor. She always explains health issues with clarity and is very patient. I definitely recommend her.
reply_text: Thanks for that dear and wish u all happiness and gud health.God bless

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We went to Doctor Aruna with confusion about the state of the pregnancy in 7th month and the way she councilled us was like an elderly family member. She made us feel very comfortable. The C Section was also conducted smoothly and we had no issues whatsoever. She gives ample time to see and gives all the necessary suggestions not to leave any doubt in our mind. She does not unnecessarily call us for consultation or lab tests or scanning or medicines. Instead she advises us to call or message unless its very necessary to meet. We were really satisfied and would recommend her always.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Hi everyone I would like to share my pleasant experience with Dr. Aruna Kumari V. We had an appointment with her for our second baby. Her friendly approach and right advises helped us lot during the days of pregnancy. She is always available to take calls and guided us during off hours. The way she treats patients is awesome. Her positive approach towards us develops confidence in me. Thanks a lot Aruna Kumari mam for caring us in my successful normal delivery. I would also like to thank all the staff members of motherhood for their caring and friendly approach right from starting of our admission till the end of discharge. Thanks a lot for the wonderful experience with you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I started my pregnancy journey with Dr Aruna Kumari in March‚Äô23. All through this time, she was very supportive, explained the treatment thoroughly and gave me lot of positivity. One of the most humble and sincere doctors I have met. My pregnancy wouldn‚Äôt have been so smooth had it been not Dr Aruna Kumari.

review:
We consulted Dr.Aruna Mam from day 1 of our pregnancy.Absolutly pleasure and lucky to have been under radar of Dr Aruna.Me and my wife have been overly satisfied with the mentoring and treatment received during the pregnancy and the Post pregnancy .She is like mom to both of us ,I mean we never felt that our parents were away from us.Dr. is very friendly and approaching.She heals us through her positive and calm helping nature.Our entire pregnancy period taken care by her.Her smiles takes all our problem.She analyse all details before making any steps and conclusion.Emergency she responds on what's app and calls. We personally thank to Dr.Aruna Mamdam for smooth carefree pregnancy and delivery.

I would suggest to visit couple's to our doctor Dr.Aruna Madam ,if they have planned for kid .

A Ray of Hope and Happiness is Dr Aruna Madam

Regards,
E Sonali

review:
We were blessed with. Baby boy last week, and would like to share our experience at cloudnine Bellandur.

First of all, many thanks to Dr. Aruna Kumari who was there to guide nd support us throughout the pregnancy. Also during delivery she was very calm and did her best to have normal delivery inspite of some complication.
We are grateful to Dr. Aruna supported by Dr. Archana during delivery, for giving us THE gift of our life.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pre-Pregnancy Counselling,Pregnancy care and management,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Gynaecological Problem,
review: Thank you Dr.Aruna Kumari Mam for your extend support for pre-pregnancy counseling and been approachable throughout in my pregnancy journey. I was conceived because of her guidance and treatment. She was very much available in phone for any kind of query and consultation which helped me a lot during Covid situation. Inspite of being ICP case, she handled my delivery case smoothly and I delivered a well being baby in Normal delivery.

NO unnecessary tests or medicines. we were extremely happy during all our consultations.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: She asked the symptoms and did basic physical examination. Based on history,  did the diagnosis and gave medication according to that. Visit was fine and she told that you can share the test reports at my personal number. But no replies on the whatsapp number. What's the use of it then? Anyways I have to consult another doctor to show the reports. Wasted my time and money.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnant Women Counseling,Pre-Pregnancy Counselling,Pregnancy care and management,
review:
From day-1 we got confident that she is the Doctor we will be consulting throughout the Maternity period. Dr Aruna has always been available and prompt in handling our case.

My wife is diabetic but we never got into any panic situation since we had faith in her and she had helped and explained us every aspect of pregnancy which we came across.

We opted Motherhood because we wanted to continue with Dr Aruna for C-Section and our first child is here which is the greatest gift of almighty.
reply_text: Thank u  for the trust and wish all gud health and happiness

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Gynae Problems,Maternal Care/ Checkup,Caesarean Section (C Section),Labor and Delivery,
review: Dr Aruna Kumari is awesome. She took such a wonderful care of my wife, explaining things carefully during pregnancy, labour, post pregnancy care with all precautions and medical care required. I always feel like I get plenty of time to explain issues without feeling rushed. She responds to the emergency and makes appropriate suggestions.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Consulted Dr Aruna from starting of my pregnancy. She always listen to problem patiently. Always available on phone and promptly reply to all the query/messages, even visited hospital on off duty hours for her patients. Very practical and always made us comfortable in all kind of situations. She had always made sure that baby and mom are doing fine.  Prompt in taking decisions. Happy and lucky to have her as my doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I consulted Dr Aruna from day one of my pregnancy! The experience has been great and I highly recommend her! She is patient , calm and explains everything in detail! Dr Aruna was responsive on phone calls and messages as well! I thank Dr Aruna for a smooth carefree pregnancy and delivery !

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: We delivered a healthy boy baby. We want to share our delivery experience with Dr Aruna Mam.As always, doctor responds to our call and messages. When we supected labour pain, immediately called doctor and doctor asked us to admit. By the time we reach hospital, evryting was ready for admission. Doctor called me and gave enough confidence on delivery process. Doctor was continuously monitoring progress and tried for normal delivery. As there was some risk doctor decided for ceserian.  Thanks a lot doctor for your timely decision.Doctor was confident on the process and took enough care for for my wife in recovery room as well. Mam, thank you so much for your love and care. We are out of words to express our gratitude.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We have been consulting Dr. Aruna for the last 2 years and it has been a blissful experience. She is extremely patient, caring, always reachable and a very humble person. She listens to every problem patiently and explains the solutions. She has a calming affect, which makes me assured and less nervous. She shared her emergency contact number on which she is always reachable, even in middle of the night. She has answered to every query of ours even the most silly ones. She has never called us unnecessarily to the hospital or prescribed unnecessary tests. With every prescription she advised, she explained us the reason and affect throughly.
Thank you doctor  for guiding us throughout and for always being there for us. ‚ô•

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We have visited her for General Checkup 10 months ago, since then she was available for all the queries through out until and after delivery. We have undergone delivery procedure under her guidance. She has been reassuring at every step of the procedure. She understood what we wanted and her patience was phenomenal. 
One of the things that we have observed about her, was her punctuality. We have been consulting with her since months and she was always punctual, to the minute, with her schedule. It is very rare these days to see such kind of dedication and punctuality. Thank you very much!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: Well i would like to say a Big thanks to Dr. Aruna in first place . i went for my infertility treatment as i was having irregular periods and PCOD problems. we were trying for children, she helped me out with **** medication and her patience levels are extreme. she took personal care of me and shared some knowledge and tips apart from medicines , treatment done and am 12 weeks pregnant now. It was a dream come true as it is 4th year of my marriage. we are so happy and thankful to Dr. Aruna madam. Still continuing treatment with her, she is very polite and answers all ur questions patiently.

She is very friendly n very much caring doctor

Satisfaction in every month check up for my first baby

As a doctor she s perfect.

Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a Gyn/Ob.

review: Mam thank you so much for helping me become a mother. You were a support to me not only medically but emotionally as well. It was because of you that I could make myself go through this roller coaster again. You are a saviour to me and my family. A doctor like you is a blessing in anyone's life. You are no less than God to me and my kids mam. Love you‚ù§

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: I really had a bad experience with the doctor and the Clinic. After confirming the appointment and reaching there, the receptionist walked upto me saying doctor is unavailable. Visit tomorrow or online consultation would be arranged. I was unwell and had no strength to really say anything at that point in time. If they could respect everybody's time and not just the doctor's. If they could have informed me earlier I could have gone else where and saved my time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Thank you mam for the truthful consultation! Very friendly and helpful staff at the hospital. Only thing is, in hospital they are charging 100/- extra other than registration fee which is mandatory with consultation fees which should be given due consideration as I could see lots of mosquitoes in the hospital itself. The cleanliness of hospital is important too!!
